jobDescription: Requisition Number 17-0350  Post Date 3/8/2018  Title Research Scientist, Nucleotide Chemistry  City Hamilton  State NJ  Company Venenum Biodesign, LLC  Description VENENUM BIODESIGN LLC is dedicated to the discovery and identification of novel small molecule therapeutic products.
